name: ICCameraDeviceDownloadDelegate
desc: Methods for managing camera file downloads.

items.name: func didDownloadFile(ICCameraFile, error: Error?, options: [String : Any], contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the requested download has completed.

items.name: func didReceiveDownloadProgress(for: ICCameraFile, downloadedBytes: off_t, maxBytes: off_t)
items.desc: Updates the delegate about the status of the download.
